alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Crawford; Knox; Marion; Morrow; Richland; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 2:41AM EDT until August 25 at 3:45AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Richland County in north central Ohio... Marion County in north central Ohio... South central Ashland County in north central Ohio... Southeastern Wyandot County in northwestern Ohio... Morrow County in north central Ohio... Southern Crawford County in north central Ohio... Knox County in north central Ohio... * Until 345 AM EDT. * At 240 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lexington to near Marseilles, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Marion, Mount Vernon, Mount Gilead, Galion, Ontario, Lexington, Loudonville, Fredericktown, Gambier, Utica, Cardington, Bellville, Centerburg, Ashley, Prospect, Danville, La Rue, Morral and Waldo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ashland; Crawford; Knox; Marion; Morrow; Richland; Wyandot
